data.description: American Tower Corp. provides real estate investment services, and owns, operates, and develops multi-tenant real estate properties. The company is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts and currently employs 4,691 full-time employees.  Its segments include U.S. & Canada, Africa & APAC property, Europe property, Latin America property, Data Centers and Services. The Company’s primary business is leasing space on multitenant communications sites to wireless service providers, radio and television broadcast companies, wireless data providers, government agencies and municipalities and tenants in a number of other industries. The Company’s Data Centers segment relates to data center facilities and related assets that the Company owns and operates in the United States. The Company’s Services segment offers tower-related services in the United States, including AZP, structural and mount analyses, and construction management.
data.naicsNationalIndustry: Lessors of Other Real Estate Property
data.naicsSector: Real Estate and Rental and Leasing
data.name: American Tower Corp
